document.forum_title: Latest World News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: J.K. Rowling Shuts Down Christian Group Over Olympically Homophobic Tweet
document.topic_text: J.K. Rowling Shuts Down Christian Group Over Olympically Homophobic Tweet Monday, 22 August 2016 () J.K. Rowling had to police the internet again. The “ Harry Potter ” author called out the United Kingdom-based Christian Voice for a homophobic tweet about British Olympic diver Tom Daley . The prayer and lobby group posted an anti-gay message after the 22-year-old, who is engaged to screenwriter Dustin Lance Black, he ... Kenya's Kipchoge Wins MARATHON ; American Galen Rupp Third Twitter Aaron Kirschenbaum RT @HuffingtonPost : J.k.
